title: The Fiend

Limit a foe's sight range. It is easier to hit, and the creature will miss more often.Attack Rolls against it have Advantage and the foe attacks with Disadvantage.

Humanoids can't be Charmed, Frightened, or become enraged.

Cloud of Daggers

4~16 Damage4d4 SlashingConjure a cloud of spinning daggers that attack anyone inside.
